segments.text: Honey , I think I need to go see the doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah ! You're bleeding all over ! What happened ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was working in the garage and cut myself with my saw .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here , use this rag to apply pressure to the cut . Does it hurt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not really , there's just a lot of blood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may just need stitches . I think they can handle this at the clinic instead of the ER . Let me make a quick phone call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to go sit in the car while I still have the stomach to walk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry ! I forgot you get queasy with the sight of blood . I'll be right there .
segments.speaker: S2
